statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.AttributeTypeID , AA.AttributeID , AA.AttributeName
, BB.AttributeTypeName , CC.AttributeItemName
FROM dbo.TBrandAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TAttributeType BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AttributeTypeID = BB.ID INNER JOIN dbo.TAttribute CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AttributeID = CC.ID WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TBrandAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBrandAttribute ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, BrandID, AttributeTypeID, AttributeID, AttributeName ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #BrandID#, #AttributeTypeID#, #AttributeID#, #AttributeName# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBrandAttribute SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, BrandID = #BrandID# , AttributeTypeID = #AttributeTypeID# , AttributeID = #AttributeID# , AttributeName = #AttributeName# WHERE ID = #ID#
